content: crochet quick baby blanket - a quick and easy blanket to crochet crocheted using just simple single and double_crochet stitches the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog ** www crochetncreate com 1 ** size approx - 35 x 32 5 inches level intermediate copyright ©2025 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/quick-crochet-blanket-pattern/
